sūratun anzalnāhā wafaraḍnāhā wa-anzalnā fīhā āyātin bayyinātin laʿallakum tadhakkarūna

al-zāniyatu wal-zānī fa-ij'lidū kulla wāḥidin min'humā mi-ata jaldatin walā takhudh'kum bihimā rafatun fī dīni al-lahi in kuntum tu'minūna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri walyashhad ʿadhābahumā ṭāifatun mina al-mu'minīna
al-zānī lā yankiḥu illā zāniyatan aw mush'rikatan wal-zāniyatu lā yankiḥuhā illā zānin aw mush'rikun waḥurrima dhālika ʿalā al-mu'minīna
wa-alladhīna yarmūna al-muḥ'ṣanāti thumma lam yatū bi-arbaʿati shuhadāa fa-ij'lidūhum thamānīna jaldatan walā taqbalū lahum shahādatan abadan wa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
illā alladhīna tābū min baʿdi dhālika wa-aṣlaḥū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
wa-alladhīna yarmūna azwājahum walam yakun lahum shuhadāu illā anfusuhum fashahādatu aḥadihim arbaʿu shahādātin bil-lahi innahu lamina al-ṣādiqīna
wal-khāmisatu anna laʿnata al-lahi ʿalayhi in kāna mina al-kādhibīna
wayadra-u ʿanhā al-ʿadhāba an tashhada arbaʿa shahādātin bil-lahi innahu lamina al-kādhibīna
wal-khāmisata anna ghaḍaba al-lahi ʿalayhā in kāna mina al-ṣādiqīna
walawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu wa-anna al-laha tawwābun ḥakīmun

inna alladhīna jāū bil-if'ki ʿuṣ'batun minkum lā taḥsabūhu sharran lakum bal huwa khayrun lakum likulli im'ri-in min'hum mā ik'tasaba mina al-ith'mi wa-alladhī tawallā kib'rahu min'hum lahu ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
lawlā idh samiʿ'tumūhu ẓanna al-mu'minūna wal-mu'minātu bi-anfusihim khayran waqālū hādhā if'kun mubīnun
lawlā jāū ʿalayhi bi-arbaʿati shuhadāa fa-idh lam yatū bil-shuhadāi fa-ulāika ʿinda al-lahi humu al-kādhibūna
walawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati lamassakum fī mā afaḍtum fīhi ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
idh talaqqawnahu bi-alsinatikum wataqūlūna bi-afwāhikum mā laysa lakum bihi ʿil'mun wataḥsabūnahu hayyinan wahuwa ʿinda al-lahi ʿaẓīmun
walawlā idh samiʿ'tumūhu qul'tum mā yakūnu lanā an natakallama bihādhā sub'ḥānaka hādhā buh'tānun ʿaẓīmun
yaʿiẓukumu al-lahu an taʿūdū limith'lihi abadan in kuntum mu'minīna
wayubayyinu al-lahu lakumu al-āyāti wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
inna alladhīna yuḥibbūna an tashīʿa al-fāḥishatu fī alladhīna āmanū lahum ʿadhābun alīmun fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wal-lahu yaʿlamu wa-antum lā taʿlamūna
walawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu wa-anna al-laha raūfun raḥīmun

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tattabiʿū khuṭuwāti al-shayṭāni waman yattabiʿ khuṭuwāti al-shayṭāni fa-innahu yamuru bil-faḥshāi wal-munkari walawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu mā zakā minkum min aḥadin abadan walākinna al-laha yuzakkī man yashāu wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
walā yatali ulū al-faḍli minkum wal-saʿati an yu'tū ulī al-qur'bā wal-masākīna wal-muhājirīna fī sabīli al-lahi walyaʿfū walyaṣfaḥū alā tuḥibbūna an yaghfira al-lahu lakum wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
inna alladhīna yarmūna al-muḥ'ṣanāti al-ghāfilāti al-mu'mināti luʿinū fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati walahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
yawma tashhadu ʿalayhim alsinatuhum wa-aydīhim wa-arjuluhum bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
yawma-idhin yuwaffīhimu al-lahu dīnahumu al-ḥaqa wayaʿlamūna anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu al-mubīnu
al-khabīthātu lil'khabīthīna wal-khabīthūna lil'khabīthāti wal-ṭayibātu lilṭṭayyibīna wal-ṭayibūna lilṭṭayyibāti ulāika mubarraūna mimmā yaqūlūna lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tadkhulū buyūtan ghayra buyūtikum ḥattā tastanisū watusallimū ʿalā ahlihā dhālikum khayrun lakum laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
fa-in lam tajidū fīhā aḥadan falā tadkhulūhā ḥattā yu'dhana lakum wa-in qīla lakumu ir'jiʿū fa-ir'jiʿū huwa azkā lakum wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna ʿalīmun
laysa ʿalaykum junāḥun an tadkhulū buyūtan ghayra maskūnatin fīhā matāʿun lakum wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tub'dūna wamā taktumūna
qul lil'mu'minīna yaghuḍḍū min abṣārihim wayaḥfaẓū furūjahum dhālika azkā lahum inna al-laha khabīrun bimā yaṣnaʿūna

waqul lil'mu'mināti yaghḍuḍ'na min abṣārihinna wayaḥfaẓna furūjahunna walā yub'dīna zīnatahunna illā mā ẓahara min'hā walyaḍrib'na bikhumurihinna ʿalā juyūbihinna walā yub'dīna zīnatahunna illā libuʿūlatihinna aw ābāihinna aw ābāi buʿūlatihinna aw abnāihinna aw abnāi buʿūlatihinna aw ikh'wānihinna aw banī ikh'wānihinna aw banī akhawātihinna aw nisāihinna aw mā malakat aymānuhunna awi al-tābiʿīna ghayri ulī al-ir'bati mina al-rijāli awi al-ṭif'li alladhīna lam yaẓharū ʿalā ʿawrāti al-nisāi walā yaḍrib'na bi-arjulihinna liyuʿ'lama mā yukh'fīna min zīnatihinna watūbū ilā al-lahi jamīʿan ayyuha al-mu'minūna laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
wa-ankiḥū al-ayāmā minkum wal-ṣāliḥīna min ʿibādikum wa-imāikum in yakūnū fuqarāa yugh'nihimu al-lahu min faḍlihi wal-lahu wāsiʿun ʿalīmun

walyastaʿfifi alladhīna lā yajidūna nikāḥan ḥattā yugh'niyahumu al-lahu min faḍlihi wa-alladhīna yabtaghūna al-kitāba mimmā malakat aymānukum fakātibūhum in ʿalim'tum fīhim khayran waātūhum min māli al-lahi alladhī ātākum walā tuk'rihū fatayātikum ʿalā al-bighāi in aradna taḥaṣṣunan litabtaghū ʿaraḍa al-ḥayati al-dun'yā waman yuk'rihhunna fa-inna al-laha min baʿdi ik'rāhihinna ghafūrun raḥīmun
walaqad anzalnā ilaykum āyātin mubayyinātin wamathalan mina alladhīna khalaw min qablikum wamawʿiẓatan lil'muttaqīna

al-lahu nūru al-samāwāti wal-arḍi mathalu nūrihi kamish'katin fīhā miṣ'bāḥun al-miṣ'bāḥu fī zujājatin al-zujājatu ka-annahā kawkabun durriyyun yūqadu min shajaratin mubārakatin zaytūnatin lā sharqiyyatin walā gharbiyyatin yakādu zaytuhā yuḍīu walaw lam tamsashu nārun nūrun ʿalā nūrin yahdī al-lahu linūrihi man yashāu wayaḍribu al-lahu al-amthāla lilnnāsi wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
fī buyūtin adhina al-lahu an tur'faʿa wayudh'kara fīhā us'muhu yusabbiḥu lahu fīhā bil-ghuduwi wal-āṣāli
rijālun lā tul'hīhim tijāratun walā bayʿun ʿan dhik'ri al-lahi wa-iqāmi al-ṣalati waītāi al-zakati yakhāfūna yawman tataqallabu fīhi al-qulūbu wal-abṣāru
liyajziyahumu al-lahu aḥsana mā ʿamilū wayazīdahum min faḍlihi wal-lahu yarzuqu man yashāu bighayri ḥisābin
wa-alladhīna kafarū aʿmāluhum kasarābin biqīʿatin yaḥsabuhu al-ẓamānu māan ḥattā idhā jāahu lam yajid'hu shayan wawajada al-laha ʿindahu fawaffāhu ḥisābahu wal-lahu sarīʿu al-ḥisābi

aw kaẓulumātin fī baḥrin lujjiyyin yaghshāhu mawjun min fawqihi mawjun min fawqihi saḥābun ẓulumātun baʿḍuhā fawqa baʿḍin idhā akhraja yadahu lam yakad yarāhā waman lam yajʿali al-lahu lahu nūran famā lahu min nūrin
alam tara anna al-laha yusabbiḥu lahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-ṭayru ṣāffātin kullun qad ʿalima ṣalātahu watasbīḥahu wal-lahu ʿalīmun bimā yafʿalūna
walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi al-maṣīru

alam tara anna al-laha yuz'jī saḥāban thumma yu-allifu baynahu thumma yajʿaluhu rukāman fatarā al-wadqa yakhruju min khilālihi wayunazzilu mina al-samāi min jibālin fīhā min baradin fayuṣību bihi man yashāu wayaṣrifuhu ʿan man yashāu yakādu sanā barqihi yadhhabu bil-abṣāri
yuqallibu al-lahu al-layla wal-nahāra inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan li-ulī al-abṣāri

wal-lahu khalaqa kulla dābbatin min māin famin'hum man yamshī ʿalā baṭnihi wamin'hum man yamshī ʿalā rij'layni wamin'hum man yamshī ʿalā arbaʿin yakhluqu al-lahu mā yashāu inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
laqad anzalnā āyātin mubayyinātin wal-lahu yahdī man yashāu ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
wayaqūlūna āmannā bil-lahi wabil-rasūli wa-aṭaʿnā thumma yatawallā farīqun min'hum min baʿdi dhālika wamā ulāika bil-mu'minīna
wa-idhā duʿū ilā al-lahi warasūlihi liyaḥkuma baynahum idhā farīqun min'hum muʿ'riḍūna
wa-in yakun lahumu al-ḥaqu yatū ilayhi mudh'ʿinīna
afī qulūbihim maraḍun ami ir'tābū am yakhāfūna an yaḥīfa al-lahu ʿalayhim warasūluhu bal ulāika humu al-ẓālimūna
innamā kāna qawla al-mu'minīna idhā duʿū ilā al-lahi warasūlihi liyaḥkuma baynahum an yaqūlū samiʿ'nā wa-aṭaʿnā wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
waman yuṭiʿi al-laha warasūlahu wayakhsha al-laha wayattaqhi fa-ulāika humu al-fāizūna
wa-aqsamū bil-lahi jahda aymānihim la-in amartahum layakhrujunna qul lā tuq'simū ṭāʿatun maʿrūfatun inna al-laha khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna
qul aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayhi mā ḥummila waʿalaykum mā ḥummil'tum wa-in tuṭīʿūhu tahtadū wamā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu al-mubīnu

waʿada al-lahu alladhīna āmanū minkum waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti layastakhlifannahum fī al-arḍi kamā is'takhlafa alladhīna min qablihim walayumakkinanna lahum dīnahumu alladhī ir'taḍā lahum walayubaddilannahum min baʿdi khawfihim amnan yaʿbudūnanī lā yush'rikūna bī shayan waman kafara baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
lā taḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū muʿ'jizīna fī al-arḍi wamawāhumu al-nāru walabi'sa al-maṣīru

yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū liyastadhinkumu alladhīna malakat aymānukum wa-alladhīna lam yablughū al-ḥuluma minkum thalātha marrātin min qabli ṣalati al-fajri waḥīna taḍaʿūna thiyābakum mina al-ẓahīrati wamin baʿdi ṣalati al-ʿishāi thalāthu ʿawrātin lakum laysa ʿalaykum walā ʿalayhim junāḥun baʿdahunna ṭawwāfūna ʿalaykum baʿḍukum ʿalā baʿḍin kadhālika yubayyinu al-lahu lakumu al-āyāti wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
wa-idhā balagha al-aṭfālu minkumu al-ḥuluma falyastadhinū kamā is'tadhana alladhīna min qablihim kadhālika yubayyinu al-lahu lakum āyātihi wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
wal-qawāʿidu mina al-nisāi allātī lā yarjūna nikāḥan falaysa ʿalayhinna junāḥun an yaḍaʿna thiyābahunna ghayra mutabarrijātin bizīnatin wa-an yastaʿfif'na khayrun lahunna wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun

laysa ʿalā al-aʿmā ḥarajun walā ʿalā al-aʿraji ḥarajun walā ʿalā al-marīḍi ḥarajun walā ʿalā anfusikum an takulū min buyūtikum aw buyūti ābāikum aw buyūti ummahātikum aw buyūti ikh'wānikum aw buyūti akhawātikum aw buyūti aʿmāmikum aw buyūti ʿammātikum aw buyūti akhwālikum aw buyūti khālātikum aw mā malaktum mafātiḥahu aw ṣadīqikum laysa ʿalaykum junāḥun an takulū jamīʿan aw ashtātan fa-idhā dakhaltum buyūtan fasallimū ʿalā anfusikum taḥiyyatan min ʿindi al-lahi mubārakatan ṭayyibatan kadhālika yubayyinu al-lahu lakumu al-āyāti laʿallakum taʿqilūna

innamā al-mu'minūna alladhīna āmanū bil-lahi warasūlihi wa-idhā kānū maʿahu ʿalā amrin jāmiʿin lam yadhhabū ḥattā yastadhinūhu inna alladhīna yastadhinūnaka ulāika alladhīna yu'minūna bil-lahi warasūlihi fa-idhā is'tadhanūka libaʿḍi shanihim fadhan liman shi'ta min'hum wa-is'taghfir lahumu al-laha inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun

lā tajʿalū duʿāa al-rasūli baynakum kaduʿāi baʿḍikum baʿḍan qad yaʿlamu al-lahu alladhīna yatasallalūna minkum liwādhan falyaḥdhari alladhīna yukhālifūna ʿan amrihi an tuṣībahum fit'natun aw yuṣībahum ʿadhābun alīmun
alā inna lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi qad yaʿlamu mā antum ʿalayhi wayawma yur'jaʿūna ilayhi fayunabbi-uhum bimā ʿamilū wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
